shared.model

Class ClientModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.ClientModelController

  • public class ClientModelController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all "CanDo" methods and provides access to the client model 
     Domain:
 -clientModel:ClientModel
    Author:
    Seth White

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad(int playerIndex,
                   Road road,
                   boolean isFree,
                   boolean setupPhase)
        Tests if the player can build a road
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to build a road, player has the required resources to buy the road, the road is attached to another road or building, the road is not over another road, player has available road piece
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement(VertexObject settlement,
                         boolean isFree,
                         boolean setupPhase)
        tests if the player can build a settlement
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to build the settlement, player has the required resources to buy the settlement, Settlement is two edges away from all other settlements
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canDiscardCards

        public boolean canDiscardCards(int playerIndex)
        tests if the player can discard cards
        Pre-Condition:
        the player has more than 7 cards after a 7 is rolled
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canOfferTrade

        public boolean canOfferTrade(int playerIndex,
                    ResourceList resourceList)
        tests if the player can offer a player trade
        Pre-Condition:
        It is the offering player's turn, or the player is counter-offering after the current player has offered a trade, The player has the resources to offer
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canAcceptTrade

        public boolean canAcceptTrade(int playerIndex,
                     ResourceList resourceList)
        /** tests if the player can accept a player trade
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to accept the trade, the player has the offered resources, the player has the asked for resources
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail
        Parameter:
        Player being offered a trade., Current trade proposal.
        Return Value:

      • canMaritimeTrade

        public boolean canMaritimeTrade(int playerIndex,
                       ResourceType resource,
                       int ratioNumber)
        tests if the player can maritime trade
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to maritime trade, the player has a settlement near a port, the player has the required ratio of resources
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canRobPlayer

        public boolean canRobPlayer(HexLocation robberLocation,
                   int robbingPlayer,
                   int robbedPlayer)
        tests if the player can rob a player
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to rob, the player has just rolled a 7 or the player has just played a soldier card, the victim player is adjacent to the hex the robber is on
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard(int playerIndex)
        tests if the player can buy a dev card
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to buy the devCard, player has the required resources to buy the card
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canPlaySoldierCard

        public boolean canPlaySoldierCard(HexLocation hexLocation,
                         int robbingPlayer,
                         int robbedPlayer)
        tests if the player can play a soldier card
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to play the card, Current player has the card, Current player has not already played a devCard this turn, this dev card was not purchased this turn
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

      • canPlayYearOfPlentyCard

        public boolean canPlayYearOfPlentyCard(int playerIndex,
                              ResourceList requestedResources)
        tests if the player can play a year of plenty card
        Pre-Condition:
        it is the current turn of the player attempting to play the card, Current player has the card, Current player has not already played a devCard this turn, this dev card was not purchased this turn
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail

        it is the current turn of the player attempting to play the card, Current player has the card, Current player has not already played a devCard this turn, this dev card was not purchased this turn
        Post-Condition:
        result: a boolean reporting success/fail
